Articles.Content:
Basically, write a prediction for the future. It can be funny or serious, but funny is more... well, fun. Anything within the forum rules is allowed. I'll start:

*Harry Potter will be the official religion of the world. Crusades will be fought over whether Hermione should have gone with Harry instead.

*WW3 will start over the debate between CoD Infinity and Battlefield 999.

*On March 3rd, 3333, Half-Life 3 will release.

Bitcoin will become a recognised currency.

(Now that could be humour or serious depending on your point of view)

EA shuts down due to the massive poop-storm from their customers. Right before that, EA released a DLC called ''Skin Pack'' priced at only $999.99! Due to that event, gamers rejoice and world peace is once restored.
Facebook will acquire sentience and destroy all life on the planet.
Siri will acquire sentience before Facebook does.

In the year 2029, Google will create a learning AI named Skynet, what will follow is history...

Edited February 26, 2014 by mrrpamplemousse
We will wear ugly clothes. (See 2001: A Space Odyssey. It's a good movie, but still...)
USA and Russia go to nuclear war over who is better.

In the year 2077, after millennia of armed conflict, the destructive nature of man could sustain itself no longer. The world was plunged into an abyss of nuclear fire and radiation.

But it was not, as some had predicted, the end of the world...
in the year 2035, the world will be consumed in war and chaos brought by the battle between apple and microsoft
In 2100, people will predict that the world will end in 2112, then laugh when the world doesn't end
in the years 2111,2552,3210,3333,4321,4444,5555,6666 people will riot as they will think that the world is ending again and again

People will end up worried about will be June 6th, 2066. The world nations will panic, and it will be a self-fulfilling prophecy.

On the same day, Spongebob Squarepants will be cancelled.
In 2056, a riot will break out somewhere with protestors arguing why there aren't any flying cars yet.

In 2147, Due to the ever increasing time required to educate people in the use of modern technologies, the world government has introduced a new class system and all citizens will be required to undergo evaluation to determine what level of teaching will be needed for them to lead happy productive lives

non-citizens can apply for a special evaluation, that if passed grants immediate citizenship

KSP enters final BETA testing stage, NASA downloads a copy and immediately gains a 34% increase in fuel savings for its proposed MARS colony landing
I am a Cristian who listens to the Alex Jones radio show, so posting my prediction would break 2 forum rules. I am sure that it is not hard to guess what my prediction is...
in 2067, humanity reaches the singularity and downloads their minds into the internet where they are corrupted by decades of memes and cat videos
